gen:link.msg:message: `AssetsCurrent` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_AssetsCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_AssetsCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AssetsNoncurrent` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_AssetsNoncurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_AssetsNoncurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
`BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults` SHOULD not exist for any period other than the current period.

`Equity` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_Equity')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_Equity return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`OutcomeAssetsCurrentLessLiabilitiesCurrent` SHOULD be equal to + `AssetsCurrent` - `LiabilitiesCurrent`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST102Variables1_OutcomeAssetsCurrentLessLiabilitiesCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST102Variables1_OutcomeAssetsCurrentLessLiabilitiesCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST102Variables1_AssetsCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST102Variables1_AssetsCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST102Variables1_LiabilitiesCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST102Variables1_LiabilitiesCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`OutcomeAssetsLessLiabilitiesCurrent` SHOULD be equal to + `AssetsNoncurrent` + `AssetsCurrent` - `LiabilitiesCurrent`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST103Variables1_OutcomeAssetsLessLiabilitiesCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST103Variables1_OutcomeAssetsLessLiabilitiesCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST103Variables1_AssetsNoncurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST103Variables1_AssetsNoncurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST103Variables1_AssetsCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST103Variables1_AssetsCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST103Variables1_LiabilitiesCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST103Variables1_LiabilitiesCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ResultForTheYear` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults` is equal to `Na`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_BalanceSheetBeforeAfterAppropriationResults return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_ResultForTheYear')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetVertical_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_ResultForTheYear return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
